subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dick Nolan played nine seasons as a N.F.L. defensive back and was later a head coach for 11 years, twice guiding the San Francisco 49ers to conference championship games.
snippet: Dick Nolan played nine seasons as a N.F.L. defensive back and was later a head coach for 11 years, twice guiding the San Francisco 49ers to conference championship games.
